WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please post individual issues if an item is not working in a specific model so the issue can be assigned to a specific model.If the item doesn't get parsed properly (the stats don't show in the item editor), then the item parser is at fault (Rawr.Base)If the items stats are there in the editor, but aren't visible in the model, then the model isn't considering the stats relevant (this may be intended or may happen for new items having new stats). This is a model issue for one or more models, there isn't generic code for this.If the items stats are visible in the model, but the item valuation doesn't seem correct, then this is a model specific issue.
WorkItem.Description:
I'm just going to rattle off a couple of items that I've noticed haven't been programmed into the appropriate models yet.
 
[Pally - Heals] Libram of Veracity - This is a Triumph badge Libram that is giving 0 in both Fight Healing and Burst Healing
 
[Shadow Priest] Talisman of Volitile Power - It is registering the crit from both the 232 and the 245 versions however the model has yet to factor in the Use effect which causes a stacking SP buff.
 
[Resto Shaman] Totem of Calming Tides - Not showing up in the totem list
                        Totem of Forest Growth/Totem of Misery - not sure if the lower cost of the spells should be affecting the scores (currently it has 0 effect).
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Special Items not giving proper values

Comments.Message:
As an update, None of the trinkets it seems is being modeled correctly. I was planning on sending in a ticket with the fix but I could not figure out where in the model to add in the modeling for the trinkets. these includes:

Talisman of Volitile Power
Reign of the Unliving
Binding Light (though not really necessary for SPriest but still want to point it out)

Plus the Horde variations to these as well.
Libram of Veracity has been added
